ActDepartment of Employment and Social Development Act
PrecisAppointment of JAIME LYNNE MELLOTT of Pender Island, British Columbia, as a full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal for the Income Security Section, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective July 6, 2017.
